actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to require that allocations and restrictions on the sale of refined petroleum products be made in a fashion which avoids inequitable treatment of users or classes of users of such products.

summary.text: Requires that allocations and restrictions on the sale of refined petroleum products be made in a fashion which avoids inequitable treatment of users or classes of users of such products.

titles.title: A bill to require that allocations and restrictions on the sale of refined petroleum products be made in a fashion which avoids inequitable treatment of users or classes of users of such products.
